example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 过去)) (ADVP (AD 曾)) (VP (VP (VV 到) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 大寨))) (VP (VCD (VV 学习) (VV 取经)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 贫)) (NP (NN 乡))) (NP (ADJP (JJ 穷)) (NP (NN 镇))))) (VP (VP (VV 摇身一变)) (VP (VV 成为) (NP-OBJ (PU “) (QP (CD 亿) (CLP (M 元))) (NP (NN 镇)) (PU ”)))))
